item.title: Mermaid JS support
item.description: If you want to use Mermaid-JS on your website. Provide mermaid as Shortcode in your markdown file. flowchart LR A --> B B --> C C --> D D --> B sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>Bob: Hi Bob Bob->>Alice: Hi Alice Find more example on Mermaid-JS website.

item.title: HTML and CSS only tabs
item.description: Basic shortcodes Link to heading The following content: {{< tabgroup >}} {{< tab name="Hello" >}} Hello World! {{< /tab >}} {{< tab name="Goodbye" >}} Goodbye Everybody! {{< /tab >}} {{< /tabgroup >}} Will generate: Hello Hello World! Goodbye Goodbye Everybody! Right alighment Link to heading You can also align the tabs to the right: {{< tabgroup align="right" >}} {{< tab name="Hello" >}} Hello World! {{< /tab >}} {{< tab name="Goodbye" >}} Goodbye Everybody!

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.

item.title: Placeholder Text
item.description: Lorem est tota propiore conpellat pectoribus de pectora summo.

item.title: Math Typesetting
item.description: Mathematical notation in a Hugo project can be enabled by using third party JavaScript libraries.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.

item.title: About
item.description: I’m Rachid ARDOUZ a fullstack engineer at inwi company based in France

item.title: Projects
item.description: Inwi’s Experience as a FullStack Engineer Link to heading Win by Inwi Link to heading Contribution in development of multiple microservices . Implementation of unit tests. Code Review and Pair programming. Myinwi Link to heading Desing and implementation of an offline SDK for scanning Ids documents such as identity Card, Passport.
